channel.title: Using a calculation an int?
channel.description:
Well, when cutting an emerald you get 67,5Xp So it would need to be this for adding the xp [code] addSkillXP(67,5, 12); [/code]
But, when compiling it said that using a comma is not allowed there. So i tryed placing a period there instead of a comma [code] addSkillXP(67.5, 12); [/code] But using a period there is also not allowed. So i went thinking and i think i have found the solution... But i dont know how to insert it.
Is there any possible way to let the server perform this calculation? 135/2 becouse thats another way to get to 67,5 Or should i just use: [code] addSkillXP(135/2, 12); [/code]
Please help.

item.title: Using a calculation an int?
item.dc:creator: @J03RY J03RY
item.description:
@J03RY wrote:

Meh, i already found the solution.

I just added
addSkillXP(135/2, 12);
instead of
addSkillXP(67,5, 12);

and recompiled and it worked xD

Read full topic

item.title: Using a calculation an int?

item.description:
@goneby1233 wrote:

have u tried editing the 135 or puttin / ?
